korean: 수도관이 얼까 봐 걱정돼서 물을 조금씩 틀어놨어.
밖에 나가면 숨쉬기도 힘들 정도로 춥다.
이불 속에서 하루 종일 웅크리고 있었다.
english: A cold wave warning was issued and temperatures dropped to -15 degrees.
I was worried the water pipes would freeze, so I kept the water running slightly.
It's so cold outside that it's even hard to breathe.
I curled up in my blankets all day.
